name: Brown Sugar Bacon Wrapped Weenies
author: bookmdanno
summary: You won't be able to eat just one...or two...or five...heck, you won't be able to stop eating them period, until they're gone !
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package hot dogs, cut in quarters crosswise
1 pound bacon, cut in quarters crosswise
directions: Preheat the oven's broiler and set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source
Wrap hot dog pieces in bacon pieces and secure with toothpicks
Broil the hot dog pieces until bacon is crisp, turning once or twice, 3 to 5 minutes per side
Melt butter in a saucepan and stir in brown sugar
Place over medium heat and bring to a boil, stirring until brown sugar has dissolved
Serve hot dog pieces with brown sugar sauce drizzled on top
